explanation: Funds are excess from the Ukraine Replacement Tranche #1 and are available due to actual contract costs for the Javelin missiles being less than the estimated replenishment cost. This is a congressional special interest item. This is emergency budget funding.

Funds provided as part of the April 25, 2022, internal reprograming action FY 22-19 IR (Tranche #2) are transferred back to the Operation and Maintenance, Defense-Wide, 22/23, appropriation. This is a congressional special interest item. This is emergency budget requirement.

Funds are excess from the Ukraine Replacement Tranche #2 and available due to the Army [ ‘Acquisition Objective having been met. This is a congressional special interest item. This is emergency budget funding.

Funds provided as part of the July 13, 2022, internal reprograming action FY 22-28 IR (Tranche #5) are transferred back to the Operation and Maintenance, Defense-Wide, 22/23, appropriation. This is a congressional special interest item. This is emergency budget requirement.
